Chase Credit Card Business.description: Chase introduced the United Business Card, offering strong bonus categories and benefits for United Airlines flyers, attracting small business owners seeking travel rewards.
Chase launched the Freedom Flex card, featuring rotating 5% cash back categories and no annual fee, appealing to consumers seeking versatile cash back options.
Chase increased the sign-up bonus for the Sapphire Preferred card to 100,000 points, attracting new customers interested in travel rewards.
Chase partnered with Instacart to offer statement credits and accelerated points on grocery deliveries, catering to the growing demand for online grocery services.
Chase launched the Aeroplan Credit Card, providing unique benefits for Air Canada travelers and expanding its airline credit card portfolio.

Chase Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Launch of Pay Yourself Back Feature
Chase Credit Card Business.description: Chase introduced the 'Pay Yourself Back' feature, allowing cardholders to redeem points for statement credits on everyday purchases, increasing redemption flexibility.
Chase faced legal challenges regarding certain credit card practices, leading to settlements and impacting customer trust.
Chase opened its first Sapphire Lounge, offering exclusive access to cardholders and enhancing the travel experience.
Chase expanded the 5% cash back categories for the Freedom Flex card, providing more earning opportunities for cardholders.
Chase introduced a dining platform offering exclusive reservations and experiences for cardholders, enhancing lifestyle benefits.
A data breach exposed sensitive credit card information of thousands of customers, leading to concerns over security and privacy.
Chase launched 'My Chase Plan,' allowing cardholders to split large purchases into fixed monthly payments, providing more payment flexibility.
Chase partnered with DoorDash to offer complimentary DashPass memberships to cardholders, adding value through food delivery benefits.
Chase introduced the 'Chase Offers' platform, providing personalized deals and discounts to cardholders, enhancing the value proposition.
Chase launched 'Chase First Banking,' a debit card and account designed for kids, aiming to attract families and foster early financial literacy.
Chase upgraded its Ultimate Rewards portal, offering more redemption options and a user-friendly interface, improving the customer experience.
Chase introduced the Slate Edge card, focusing on low interest rates and credit-building features, appealing to consumers seeking financial flexibility.
Chase partnered with Peloton to offer statement credits and bonus points on fitness memberships and equipment purchases, tapping into the health and wellness market.
Chase introduced the United Business Card, offering strong bonus categories and benefits for United Airlines flyers, attracting small business owners seeking travel rewards.
